name: PioPio
backstory: This actually started out as a birthday gift from my old roommate who made me a pokemon trainer version of myself. I started using it as my online persona, while slowly getting some more updated versions of it, the one you see around the site is what I use today!
funFacts: The bag they're wearing contains blind box collectibles, particularly Smiskis and Peach Riot figures.

images.description: Credits to Artist: Lonesomeocean\nA reference sheet for myself or anyone who needs it, this is the latest design I use for everything now!

name: JennStar
backstory: My partner also wanted a Sona so that we could have matching ones! This way whenever I draw or commission art, we can have both of us in it!
funFacts: When making the design, we based it on a version of Dawn from the Pokemon series!

images.description: Credits to Artist: ruuruuart\nThe full body reference for JennStar.
Credits to Artist: mirai\nSince our sona's are based on Pokemon trainers we included a pokemon we both loved!
Credits to Artist: RindessG\nWe wanted to create a matching profile picture for both of our personas! So here's the current one we use of use making a heart with our hands!

name: Milo
backstory: Milo started out out learning how to fight from an old monk who lived in an abandoned temple in the jungle near his home. Hoping to learn less boring stuff and focus more on fighting he followed a travelling troupe of fighters to the Astrodome! That's how he became the lucha-obsessed freak he is today, however after coming back from his short term adventure, he's come to find his home destroyed and his teacher at fault.
funFacts: They don't have any outfits that aren't just luchador themed.

images.description: Credit to Artist: AlexSanders\n My first commissioned actual art of Milo, I liked the tattoo/outfit we came up with, but the size made him look too human, so after a while a while I decided to move from this one
Credit to Artist: miithers\n A group shot of the whole party in a cuddle pile, organized by Micachu for the end of our campaign!
Credit to Artist: Raf4Art\n An active pose for Milo, he's much more halfling sized here and he's showing off his very confident/fun demeanor when it comes to fighting.

name: Elowyn Knowlesworth
backstory: A gifted child from an already gifted family, Elowyn became the seemingly godsent wizard prodigy that the Knowlesworth family had been secretly hoping for. However, after hitting a wall in her studies (and some well earned burn out/impostor syndrome) she decided to run away from the expectations and become a Hunter in a guild, changing her identity to avoid being found. It's been years and she hasn't been found out yet, but neither has she learned a single new spell. Soon though, her family ties would catch up to her as the town's fate rests in her party's hands...
funFacts: Some of the pages in her spell book are secretly just fanfic she writes when bored.

images.description: Credit to Artist: RainSlices\nCommission of a reference of Elowyn in her Hunter Captain outfit.
